column4: hy all , little question, i forgot long time ago i changed my message before login and the msg after login now i get something out of the box from ubuntu but wanne change that, anyone know where the file is located?
anyone? change the welcome msg before login in ubuntu;, its a file somewhere stored... forgot the location....
You're welcome! It's a symlink, but you can replace it with a flat file, or point it somewhere more memorable.
